document_data.name: Resist Magic
document_data.mainbody: '''''Resist magic''''' was a southern magic [[divine magic|divine]] spell available to worshipers of [[Thoth]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell imbued the caster with a measure of magical resistance. The strength of the magical resistance was determined by the caster's skill level. The caster could only use this spell on themselves.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Somatic component|somatic]] and [[Verbal component|verbal]] components.
